body_html:
Hi @bignamehyp ,

The following are the exact command we used on tf_cnn_benchmark.
AlexNet:
python tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --local_parameter_device=cpu --num_gpus=1
--batch_size=512 --num_batches=10000 --model=alexnet --variable_update=replicated --all_reduce_spec nccl
InceptionV3:
python tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --local_parameter_device=cpu --num_gpus=1
--batch_size=64 --num_batches=10000 --model=inception3 --variable_update=replicated --all_reduce_spec nccl
ResNet50:
python tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --local_parameter_device=cpu --num_gpus=1
--batch_size=64 --num_batches=10000 --model=resnet50 --variable_update=replicated --all_reduce_spec nccl

We observed that the GPU temperature found the results are within a reasonable range.

GPUID | GPU0 | GPU1 | GPU2 | GPU3 | GPU4 | GPU5 | GPU6 | GPU7

Average | 76.22 |77.21 | 76.79 | 76.69 | 77.70 | 75.67 | 77.30 | 76.83
Max Temp. | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80
Slow down Temp | 92 | 92 | 92 | 92 | 92 | 92 | 92 | 92
body_text:
Hi @bignamehyp ,
The following are the exact command we used on tf_cnn_benchmark.
AlexNet:
python tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --local_parameter_device=cpu --num_gpus=1 
--batch_size=512 --num_batches=10000 --model=alexnet --variable_update=replicated --all_reduce_spec nccl
InceptionV3:
python tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --local_parameter_device=cpu --num_gpus=1 
--batch_size=64 --num_batches=10000 --model=inception3 --variable_update=replicated --all_reduce_spec nccl
ResNet50:
python tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --local_parameter_device=cpu --num_gpus=1 
--batch_size=64 --num_batches=10000 --model=resnet50 --variable_update=replicated --all_reduce_spec nccl
We observed that the GPU temperature found the results are within a reasonable range.
GPUID                     | GPU0 | GPU1 | GPU2 | GPU3 | GPU4 | GPU5 | GPU6 | GPU7
Average                 | 76.22   |77.21  | 76.79  | 76.69 | 77.70 | 75.67  | 77.30 | 76.83
Max Temp.             | 80       | 80      | 80      | 80      | 80      | 80       | 80      | 80
Slow down Temp   | 92       | 92      | 92      | 92      | 92      | 92       | 92      | 92
body:
Hi @bignamehyp ,

The following are the exact command we used on tf_cnn_benchmark. 
AlexNet:
python tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --local_parameter_device=cpu --num_gpus=1 \
--batch_size=512 --num_batches=10000 --model=alexnet --variable_update=replicated --all_reduce_spec nccl
InceptionV3:
python tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --local_parameter_device=cpu --num_gpus=1 \
--batch_size=64 --num_batches=10000 --model=inception3 --variable_update=replicated --all_reduce_spec nccl 
ResNet50:
python tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --local_parameter_device=cpu --num_gpus=1 \
--batch_size=64 --num_batches=10000 --model=resnet50 --variable_update=replicated --all_reduce_spec nccl


We observed that the GPU temperature found the results are within a reasonable range.

GPUID                     | GPU0 | GPU1 | GPU2 | GPU3 | GPU4 | GPU5 | GPU6 | GPU7

Average                 | 76.22   |77.21  | 76.79  | 76.69 | 77.70 | 75.67  | 77.30 | 76.83
Max Temp.             | 80       | 80      | 80      | 80      | 80      | 80       | 80      | 80
Slow down Temp   | 92       | 92      | 92      | 92      | 92      | 92       | 92      | 92 

![broadwell_gpu_temp](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7540820/36650062-25fcfce6-1adc-11e8-9c23-37a576bfc2e9.png)
